## Examples The following example shows a complete <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator> used for a custom activity. The custom activity is a `ConsoleWriteLineActivity` activity that has a single dependency property named `Msg` of type <xref:System.String>. The validator ensures that the `Msg` property is set. If it is not set, the compiler displays an error when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator.Validate%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ActivityValidator> and the compilation fails.
